biotools.summary: Several quantitative and visualized benchmarks for RNA-seq quantification pipelines. Two-condition quantifications for genes, transcripts, junctions or exons by each pipeline with necessary meta information should be organized into numeric matrices in order to proceed the evaluation.

bioschemas.name: rnaseqcomp

Two-condition quantifications for genes, transcripts, junctions or exons by each pipeline with necessary meta information should be organized into numeric matrices in order to proceed the evaluation.
